name: Plan Projections
overview:
Ideas to Numbers. We take your business ideas and turn them into simple affordable financial projections.

Plan Projections is a small professionally qualified team based in the UK offering business planning services to clients. The company, has a reputation built on strong solid foundations from years of experience in the accountancy industry, for creating financial projections for all types of businesses.

Plan Projections offers a comprehensive selection of simple, affordable financial projections aimed at business owners and professionals. The projections can be fine-tuned to suit all industry sectors, and can be used standalone or formatted as part of a current business plan.

The Standard Package contains all the essentials including, important assumptions, profit and Loss, balance sheet, cash flow, sales projection, personnel plan, start-up costs, start-up funding, and past performance. Further options can be added to customise the projections including a one page projection summary, an outline plan or business model canvas to explain the business idea, charts, PowerPoint presentations and many others. Full details are available on the website.
